text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $ST$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Find the length of the line $ST$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $RT$ is $3x + 3$.
The length of the line $SR$ is $4x - 4$.
The length of the line $ST$ is $12 + x$.
The length of the line $RT$ is equal to the length of the line $SR$.
line_instances: There are lines $SR$, $ST$, and $RT$ forming a triangle $STR$.
